name: e-man
description:
We invest in 5-10 ideas a year. We accept payment in Bitcoins. Mission To help founders change the world. To help pivot todays traditional brands into tomorrow's agile fast moving fail fast opportunistic bandit thinking husslers. Company Overview Founded by Matt Hagger who partnered with Eugene Kouumdjieff e-Man is an ideas lab in Oxford Circus London. We create our own products and partner with founders to bring ideas to life.
The E-Man team develops technology in house and incubates companies. Description Our process is a well-researched and evolved practice that has been in development over a number of years, to ensure continuous improvement using lean and agile methodologies. Taking your product idea to launch can be broken down into 11 mini project components, under the banner's of Conceive, Create and Build. We can be hired to fulfil individual components or chunks, but it is when you hire us to implement our entire process from strategy through to QA, that we can guarantee the magic!
READ MORE...
